title: Thunder Down Under & Lala’s Trip to NYC
itunes:author: Lala Kent | Cumulus Podcast Network
content:encoded:
Alex and Kurt from the Thunder Down Under invade GTL with their seriously sexy swagger, mad stage skills, and some fantastic stories about performing in the hottest live show in Las Vegas! They talk about their start with Thunder, training and learning the routines, interacting with the mostly-female fans, and how they choose the lucky ladies to come onstage with them each night. They also reveal how they met Lala at Scheana & Brock’s wedding, and what kept Brock from becoming a Thunder man too. Plus, Lala shares an update on her latest New York trip and how she’s navigating dating life.
